results.title: Metabolic enzyme ACSL3 is a prognostic biomarker and correlates with anticancer effectiveness of statins in non-small cell lung cancer
results.text_hl: With the aim of studying the anticancer effects of statins in @SPECIES_9606 @@@human@@@ @<m>DISEASE_Carcinoma_Non_Small_Cell_Lung</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002289 @@@NSCLC@@@ cells, we determined the antiproliferative activity of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ in our @CELLLINE_CVCL:YD58 @@@CRL 5803@@@ and 5908 cell lines (Fig 3B).

citations.NLM: Fernández LP, Merino M, Colmenarejo G, Moreno-Rubio J, Sánchez-Martínez R, Quijada-Freire A, Gómez de Cedrón M, Reglero G, Casado E, Sereno M, Ramírez de Molina A. results.title: Cholesterol depletion decreases adhesion of non-small cell lung cancer cells to E-selectin
results.text_hl: Under hemodynamic flow conditions, the number of adherent @<m>DISEASE_Carcinoma_Non_Small_Cell_Lung</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002289 @@@NSCLC@@@ cells on @GENE_SELE @GENE_6401 @@@E-selectin@@@ significantly decreased by @CHEMICAL_methyl_beta_cyclodextrin @CHEMICAL_MESH:C108732 @@@MbetaCD@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simva@@@ treatments, whereas SMase treatment did not show a significant effect.

results.title: BBB-penetrating codelivery liposomes treat brain metastasis of non-small cell lung cancer with EGFRT790M mutation
results.text_hl: We developed a dual-targeting liposomal system with modification of anti-@GENE_CD274 @GENE_29126 @@@PD-L1@@@ nanobody and @GENE_TFRC @GENE_7037 @@@transferrin receptor@@@ (@GENE_TFRC @GENE_7037 @@@TfR@@@)-binding peptide @GENE_CD6 @GENE_923 @@@T12@@@ for codelivery of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@/@CHEMICAL_Gefitinib @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077156 @@@gefitinib@@@ to treat BMs of @<m>DISEASE_Carcinoma_Non_Small_Cell_Lung</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002289 @@@NSCLC@@@.

results.title: [Statins enhance anti-tumor effect of suberoylanilide hydroxamic acid on human non-small cell lung carcinoma cells].
results.journal: Zhejiang Da Xue Xue Bao Yi Xue Ban
results.text_hl: OBJECTIVE: To evaluate the anti-@DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@tumor@@@ effect of the combination of @CHEMICAL_Vorinostat @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077337 @@@suberoylanilide hydroxamic acid@@@(@CHEMICAL_Vorinostat @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077337 @@@SAHA@@@) with statins(@CHEMICAL_Lovastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008148 @@@lovastatin@@@ or @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@) on @<m>DISEASE_Carcinoma_Non_Small_Cell_Lung</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002289 @@@non-small cell lung carcinoma@@@(NSCLC) cells.
